A

addChild(Leaf) - Method in class Leaf
This method adds a child to the current leaf

G

getChain() - Method in class Leaf
This method gets the name of the leaf
getChildren() - Method in class Leaf
This method gets all children of a leaf
getDepth() - Method in class Leaf
This method gets the depth where the leaf is located
getMaxDepth() - Method in class InputReader
This method asks for the maximum depth that the created tree must have.
getNonTerminalSymbols() - Method in class InputReader
This method reads the line of the input file that contains the Non terminal Symbols and returns an array of those symbols
getProductions() - Method in class InputReader
This method reads all the remaining lines of the example which contain the productions of the language and represents them as a Hashtable of productions
getStartSymbol() - Method in class InputReader
This method reads the line of the input file that contains the Start Symbol of the Tree
getString() - Method in class InputReader
This method reads from the console a String that should be validated by the parser
getTerminalSymbols() - Method in class InputReader
This method reads the line of the input file that contains the list of Terminal Symbols

I

InputReader - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to read input from the console and from the different files given as examples to store the rules of the language This class creates two instances of the Scanner, one of them will read the users input from console and the other reads the contents of the example files.
InputReader() - Constructor for class InputReader
When an instance of Input Reader is created first it waits for the user's input to indicate from which example file should the parser read to create the language.

L

Leaf - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to build the leaves that make up the Parsing Tree.
Leaf(String, int) - Constructor for class Leaf
Creates a new leaf with the given parameters

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
 
Main - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 

P

parsingProcess(String, int) - Method in class TopDownParsing
This method is the implementation of the Top Down Parsing algorithm.

T

TopDownParsing - Class in <Unnamed>
This class contains all the algorithms needed to process a given string, validate if is accepted in the language and create a string representation of the resulting parsing tree that can be seen using the jsSyntax Tree tool.
TopDownParsing(String[], String[], String, Hashtable<String, LinkedList<String>>) - Constructor for class TopDownParsing
Creates an instance of Top Down Parsing with all the necessary information to create a given language
